japanese:
あ、ここってミュージアムショップ？
お土産とか見ていかない？
translation:
Oh, is this the museum shop?
Do you want to look for souvenirs?

japanese:
うん、そうしよっか。
上杉さん、いいですか？
translation:
Yeah, let's do that.
Is it okay with you, Uesugi-san?

japanese:
お、おう、別にいいぞ。
時間もまだたっぷりあるしな。
translation:
Uh, yeah, sure.
We still have plenty of time, after all.

japanese:
（全員合流してみれば、四葉もいつも通りか。
　さっきは失望させちまったみたいだが、
　ここは四葉に合わせて焦らずに……）
translation:
(When everyone gathered, Yotsuba was back to her usual
 self. Although she seemed disappointed earlier,
 I won't rush her here, and follow her pace...)

japanese:
お兄ちゃん、見て見て！
ぬいぐるみがたくさんある！
translation:
Look, big bro, look!
There are lots of stuffed animals!

japanese:
うわ……。
なんだこれ、すごい種類だな。
translation:
Wowww...
This is incredible. So many different ones.

japanese:
あっ！　マナティーのぬいぐるみがありますよ！
しかもご飯のニンジンまで抱えて……！
translation:
Ah! There's a manatee stuffed animal!
And it's holding a carrot!

japanese: これ、ずるい……！
translation: That's so playful!

japanese: ２人ってマナティーそんなに好きだっけ？
translation: Do you both really like manatees that much?

japanese:
こっちはジンベエザメ？
さすがに小さいわね。
translation: Is this a juvenile whale shark? It's quite small.

japanese:
いや、ジンベエザメ実物大のぬいぐるみは
あり得ないだろ。
translation:
Well, it's impossible
to make a life-sized whale shark stuffed animal.

japanese:
あら、クマノミだわ。
やっぱりカラフルで可愛いわね。
translation:
Oh, this is a clownfish.
They're just so colorful and cute.

japanese: こっちの白くて細長いのはなんだろ？
translation: What's this white, long thing?

japanese: チンアナゴのぬいぐるみだって。
translation: It's a stuffed animal of a spotted garden eel, it says.

japanese: ほほう、このサイズ感は抱き枕によさそう。
translation: Oh, this size would be perfect as a body pillow.

japanese:
……そんなこと言うから、
枕にしか見えなくなってきた。
translation:
...Now that you say that,
I can only see it as a pillow.

japanese:
あっ！　これ可愛いかも。
ほら、ふわふわのイルカ！
translation:
Ah! This one is cute.
Look, it's a fluffy dolphin!

japanese:
イルカもいいなぁ。
どうしようかな、でもやっぱりこの子かなぁ。
translation:
Dolphins are great too.
I'm not sure which one to get, though.
Maybe this one.

japanese: らいはちゃん、なにを買うか決めましたか？
translation: Raiha-chan, have you decided what to get?

japanese:
私は、このジンベーちゃんにする。
ジンベエザメのジンベーちゃん。
translation:
I'm getting this.
It's a stuffed whale shark named 'Jinbei-chan!'

japanese: あはは、もう名前つけちゃいましたか。
translation: Ahaha, did you already give it a name?

japanese:
私はこのチンアナゴにしようかな。
名前は『フータロー』で。
translation: I'm going to get that spotted garden eel and name it 'Futaro.'

japanese: おい、ちょっと待て。
translation: Hey, wait a sec.

japanese: じゃあ、私のクマノミは『フー君』で決まりね。
translation: Then, my clownfish will be named 'Fu-kun.'

japanese: だから、なんで俺の名前なんだよ？
translation: Why are these things getting my name?

japanese:
ほら、よく見て。
このチンアナゴ、目元がフータローそっくり。
translation:
Look closely.
The eyes of this eel
look just like yours, Futaro.

japanese:
そっくりじゃねぇよ！
人間はこんな目してねぇし！
translation:
It doesn't look like me at all!
Humans don't have eyes like that!

japanese:
ぬいぐるみの名前なんて、
愛着が持てればなんだっていいのよ。
ねー、フー君？
translation:
It doesn't matter what you name a stuffed animal,
as long as you have an attachment to it. Right, Fu-kun?

japanese: ぬいぐるみに同意を求めるな。
translation: Don't make stuffed animals agree with you.

japanese: ねえ、四葉さんのイルカはなんて名前にするの？
translation:
Hey, what are you going to name your dolphin,
Yotsuba-san?

japanese:
えっ？
このイルカの名前ですか！？
translation: Huh? The name for this dolphin?!

japanese: うん、四葉さんもつけてあげようよ。
translation: Yeah, you give yours a name, Yotsuba-san.

japanese: じゃ、じゃあ、この子の名前は……ふっ――
translation: S-so, this'll be...F%p-2;――

japanese:
ふう……ふっ、ふっ……。
ふっ、ふわふわらいはちゃん！！
translation:
F-...F-F-...
F-Fluffy Raiha-chan!!

japanese: ……ふわふわらいは？
translation: ...Fluffy Raiha-chan?

japanese:
イルカの名前ですよ！
この子は『ふわふわらいはちゃん』で決まりです！
translation:
That's the name for the dolphin!
'Fluffy Raiha-chan!'

japanese:
うむ、なるほどな！
なんたってイルカは水族館の大人気アイドルだ！
わかってるじゃないか、四葉！
translation:
Hmm, I see. After all,
dolphins are the most popular idols in aquariums.
You really get that, right, Yotsuba?!

japanese:
そう、その通りです！
上杉さんならわかってくれると思ってました！
translation:
Yes, that's right!
I thought you would understand, Uesugi-san!

japanese:
当然だろ？
なんたって俺はらいはの兄なんだからな！
translation:
Of course.
I'm her big brother, after all!

japanese:
そうですよね！
あはは……はぁ……。
translation:
That's right!
Ahaha... *sigh*

japanese: 作戦失敗しちゃった……。
translation: The strategy has failed...

japanese: ここまでお膳立てしたのにダメかぁ。
translation: We worked hard for this, but it didn't work out.

japanese: よ、四葉なりに頑張っていたと思いますよ？
translation: W-well, I think Yotsuba did her best in her own way.

japanese: フー君も、あれで気がつかないって。
translation: Even Fu-kun didn't notice.

japanese: 元々、らいはちゃんのことになると暴走しがちだから。
translation:
Yotsuba tends to get carried away
when it comes to Raiha-chan.

japanese: これは、思った以上に厳しいのかも……。
translation: This might be harder than I thought...
